name: Manjiro-Sano-md
description: Lazmiiiâ€¢) You have to fill in this box with thought and understanding because you won't be able to change it on WhatsApp again, okay

PREFIX.description: Enter a symbol for your bot's prefix, e.g. . , ! ? Enter only one symbol

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: If you want your bot to mark messages as read, enter |yes|, otherwise enter |no|

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: If you want your bot to auto-see status updates, enter |yes|, otherwise enter |no|

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: If you want your bot to save and send status updates to your inbox, enter |yes|, otherwise enter |no|

PM_PERMIT.description: If you want anyone to be able to use your bot in private messages, enter |no|, otherwise enter |no|

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Bot ke menu ki pic ka Link Likho

PUBLIC_MODE.description: If you want anyone to be able to use your bot, enter |yes|, otherwise enter |no|

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the name of your Heroku app

OWNER_NUMBER.desc: Enter your phone number (without the + sign, e.g. 263xxxxxx)

WARN_COUNT.desc: Enter the number of warnings before a user is blocked or removed from a group

CHAT_BOT.desc: If you want your bot to respond to messages, enter |yes|, otherwise enter |no|

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: If you want a starting message to be sent when the bot is connected, enter |yes|, otherwise enter |no|

PRESENCE.description: Enter |online| to always show the bot as online, |typing| to show 'is typing...', |recording| to show 'is recording...', or leave blank for no presence
